definitions.definition: A single strap or material which runs from the front of the garment around the back of the wearer's neck , leaving most of the back uncovered, often used in swimsuits and women's dresses .
A halter top or halterneck top (a garment with such a strap).

main_definition: A single strap or material which runs from the front of the garment around the back of the wearer's neck , leaving most of the back uncovered, often used in swimsuits and women's dresses .
secondary_definitions: ( less common ) A halter top or halterneck top (a garment with such a strap).
